messages.message: Heads up on a piece of infrastructure that you wouldn't think much about but can impact everyone. We are working towards rolling out a networking mesh in Kubernetes. We are using `istio` to create a mesh. You can read more about istio and why we are using it at Instabase: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1hHmb31LVtqsVLwIO3dxC7bL70xjqWG0B0wcfen8_ptQ/edit#
